rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 27 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 2:43 PM, 30 June 2025(Monday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Pampanga, Cavite, Bataan and Batangas within the next 2 hours.



Heavy to intense rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Bulacan(San Jose del Monte, Dona Remedios Trinidad, Norzagaray, San Rafael, San Ildefonso, Angat, Santa Maria, Bustos, Pandi, Bocaue, Marilao, San Miguel), Rizal(San Mateo, Rodriguez, Antipolo, Cainta), Metro Manila(Quezon City, Caloocan, Marikina), Tarlac(Concepcion, Bamban, Capas, San Jose), Zambales(Candelaria, Masinloc, Palauig, Iba), Laguna(Victoria, Calauan, Calamba, Los Banos, Bay, San Pablo, Pila, Santa Cruz, Nagcarlan, Alaminos, Pakil, Paete, Pangil, Kalayaan, Siniloan), Quezon(Tagkawayan) and Nueva Ecija(Carranglan, Lupao) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
